•
34 ° 25 ′S
,
57 ° 44 ′W
; 50 m asl
: Colonia Department, Riachuelo, mosses or lichens on rocks, trees or posts or aquatic macrophytes.
Claps & Rossi ( 1997 )

Record numbers: Bolivia : 2 , Brazil : 2 , Chile : 5 , Uruguay : 1 ;
total: 10 .

Remarks: This largely Holarctic species (
McInnes 1994 a
) was re-described by
Binda & Pilato ( 1992 )
. Comparing specimens from Rancagua, Chile (
Ramazzotti 1962 a
)
Binda & Pilato ( 1992 )
ascribed the Chilean samples to a new species (see:
M. ramazzotti
below). This suggests that all South American
Minibiotus furcatus
records should be verified.
